programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: Straight Into Compton: Biddaz With Attitude
programme.desc: The buyers descend on Compton, Calif.; Darrell and Brandon can't get their rappers or their lockers straight; Jarrod and Brandi find a unique suit; Dave Hester finds himself in a tight squeeze; Barry uncovers an antique GPS system.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Darrell hopes to score another major find as the bidders converge in Stanton, Calif.; Mark's custom-made man purse is filled with cash; Nabila's locker is fit for a dummy.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: Orange You Glad Dan Sold It Again?
programme.desc: In Burbank, Calif., Barry and Jarrod lose a packed locker to a bold new buyer; Herb and Mike hope to crush a contemptible competitor.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers return to Costa Mesa, Calif.; Ivy goes all in; Darrell uncovers a major collectible; Barry bets against himself and wins.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Rene's superstitious attitude could prove to be a hindrance; Ivy trusts his gut; Jarrod and Brandi manage to get the last laugh on their rivals.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dan and Laura face a life-or-death crisis as the buyers assemble in Hemet, Calif.; Brandi tries to keep Jarrod focused on business; Mary finds an out-of-this-world item.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Mary feels out of place in high-society Palm Springs, Calif.; Ivy keeps his eyes open for vintage items; Darrell battles Rene.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers look for great deals in Costa Mesa, Calif., an area that Dave knows all too well; Mary attempts to spend big; Darrell hopes to shut out a competitor.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy hopes to change his luck in Montebello, Calif.; Jarrod and Brandi fight for big lockers; Dave controls his bidding but can't keep a lid on his temper.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Auction Mayhem
programme.desc: Brandi, Jarrod, Darrell clash; Ivy battles; Mary, Renee give cold shoulder.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Barry's Best Buys
programme.desc: A collection of instances where Barry Weiss achieves storage-unit success by lending a helpful hand or teaming up with the competition.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Hollywood Hauls
programme.desc: Ivy races against time to score a locker and get home; Rene spends the most money of anyone, but it's Darrell and Brandon who paint their way to success; treasure hides in a locker far, far away; a locker contains antique Hollywood gold.
